transcripts.text: Don't go down there.
Don't go down there.
Don't go down there.  Excuse me, sir.  Curfew is in effect right now.  You don't belong out here.  What's your name?
Why shouldn't I kill you right now?
Because you need me.
Are you familiar with what the Bible says about psychics?  Fortune tellers?
Yes.  They are to be put to death.
I detest them.
Tell a person's future and you're a fortune teller to be detested and killed.  Tell God's future, and you are a prophet to be revered.  Are we to be godly or not?  I'm not a fortune teller.
Well, you've made quite a name for yourself making predictions, all of which have come true.
Because I am astute, not because I am psychic.
You said I need you like you know me.  You don't even seem surprised to see me.  Were you expecting me?
Shouldn't you, of all people, know?
I guess I should.  But I'm actually the one who's not what people think I am.
And what are you?
What do you think I am?
God.
And what makes you think that?
Yahweh, you came to me for the same reason.  everyone else comes to me.  I know things.
So you don't find it odd that there's something you know that God does not?

No.  Why?  You said it yourself.  You aren't what people think you are.  There's much you don't know about this world, even though you created it.  The ancient texts depict you as knowledgeable, but they were written by people every bit as flawed as yourself.  You are being tested, Yahweh.  And it's a test you desperately want to pass.
So you figured out what this world is?
I have.

The only two people to know of the real world were Lucy and Jeffrey.  Yet for several lifetimes now, Lucy was still in hell and Jeffrey was still in prison.  So how could this woman possibly have figured out that the world is a simulation designed to test me?  How?  How?
Do you want my advice or not?  Is that not the real reason that you came here?
It is.
Then you have to pay my fee.
How about I don't kill you with the snap of my fingers?
Because that's not in your best interest, Yahweh.
What fee?
Try it.  It's delicious.
Why?
Because.  It's my fee.
No, it's a piece of fruit.
It's also poetic.  justice, Yahweh.  Eat it, and I will give you my knowledge.
Oh, I see.  You want to humiliate me.

No, I want to humble you.  It's only humiliation if you're proud.  Call it a test of faith.  I'm interested to know where your loyalties truly lie.  Putting your pride aside will go a long way in gaining my confidence.  So, will you partake or will you not?  Now I'm going to share what I know.  Are you listening?
Of course.
Do nothing.  What?
That's not an answer.
It's THE answer, Yahweh.  Do nothing and you will succeed.  Your interference will only make matters worse.
But matters have gotten worse with my absence.

Have they?  Look at the history of your interactions with human beings.  They disobeyed you again and again, and you killed them for it again and again.  Did that ever solve your problem?  You drowned them in a flood, but it did not change them.  You burned them at Sodom and Gomorrah, But it did not change them.  You sent them to war again and again, but it did not change them.  It went on that way for thousands of years.  Regret after regret.  Finally, you left them alone.  And in a couple hundred years, their castles became skyscrapers.  You left them alone, and they went from wandering the desert to walking on the moon.  You left them alone, and they went from fruitlessly trying to pray diseases away to actually curing and eradicating them through their own efforts.  In your absence, despite the trepidation of Nietzsche proclaiming that God is dead, they live longer, became more peaceful, more prosperous, and more knowledgeable.  Leave them alone.  Stay dead.
But now they're destroying themselves.
A temporary hiccup, I assure you.
How can you be so sure?
Haven't I proven myself enough?  You said it yourself.  All my predictions come true.
So my tests won't end while they're at their lowest?
No, it won't.
How can I be sure you're not saying this just to save your own skin?
Yahweh, have a little faith, won't you?
Do not mock me.  But... Okay.  I'll stay out of it.
Goodbye, Yahweh.
Thank you.
I did my part, Jeffrey.  Now you do yours.
It's not my part, Lucy.  It's Yahweh's.
What do you mean?

I'm bringing back the old Yahweh.  If he fails this test, it's not going to be because we lied, but because of his original attitude toward it, back when he was still unaware that it was a test.  The world is going to play by the old rules.  His rules.
So we destroy society, force them to live in constant fear.

And then hand them the solution.  The ancient texts from which the people first arose.  Strip the credit of their past success from them and give it to the religion.  Credit the religion with everything that is good and those who resist it with everything bad.  Once they put their faith in an authoritarian religious mindset, they'll be spinning their tires until the test ends.  And if you did your job, Yahweh will stand idly by and let it happen.  Hell, he may even enjoy having people worship him again.  Earth will be what it truly would be had neither of us ever intervened.  Your little prank will never be discovered, and my attempt to deal with it will remain hidden.  Yahweh will fail his test.  And then we can all get on with our lives as if this nightmare never happened.
Why do I have a feeling it won't be that simple?
Because it never is.  So stay sharp.
I also have the feeling that you're still not okay with destroying Earth's people.
Don't worry about it.  They're just AI, like you said.
Jeffrey.
Yeah.
Do you feel your copy?  Still sitting in prison?
Of course.  It's like... Like I'm there, sitting in that cell right now.  But it's not as bad as before, because it's also like he's here.  Like I'm here, experiencing freedom.
I feel my copy.  In hell.
I'm sorry.
It's like you say.  It's not as bad when I'm also here with you.

Again and again the heretics, degenerates and traitors have brought us to the brink of destruction.  No more!  They indoctrinate our youth to reject the scientific fact that tells us they are inferior.  They indoctrinate our youth to reject the holy truth that tells us they are damned.  That which leads you to destruction is not freedom.  Therefore, freedom to practice false religions is not freedom of religion.  Freedom to blasphemy or idolatry is not freedom of speech or expression.  For how can that which oppresses our very souls be called freedom?  We must bring back the commandments of old and put to death those who pervert the Scripture by claiming Christ unbound us from the law.  Christ himself told us unequivocally that he came not to abolish the law, but to fulfill it, and that those who set it aside will be called the least among us.  So we too should never again fear calling those people what they really are.  The least among us.  No, Christ did not change the law.  He made it more clear than ever before.  There was a time when we put heretics, murderers, and adulterers to death.  We shall do so again, but this time we will not be led astray, for we will fully commit to the word of God, the holy word that says if you have anger towards your brother or sister, you have committed murder.  And what do we do with murderers?  With love, we send them to God for righteous judgment.  The Holy Word says, if you look at another woman with lust, you have committed adultery.  And what do we do with adulterers?  With love, we send them to God for righteous judgment.  Resistance against the great renewal of the old order is resistance against God Himself.  And what do we do to those who rebel against God?  What do we do to those who take our Lord's name in vain?  What do we do to those who dare worship that which is false?
with love we send them to God for righteous judgment.
